title: Constructivist-Based Geography Inquiry Project: Learner-Centered Education Utilizing Digital Resources

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of fundamental geographical concepts and proficiency in using digital devices
context.additional_context: Online environment integrating digital libraries and collaboration tools for practical geography learning aligned with national assessment systems

learning_goals: Learners can analyze causal relationships between geographical phenomena and derive/explain over three case studies
Learners design and present comparative regional environmental characteristics projects using digital geographical resources
Learners complete map analysis reports incorporating peer feedback through online collaboration tools
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
